医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家鉴定出与免疫治疗阳性反应相关的潜在生物标志物加州大学洛杉矶分校琼森综合癌症中心的科学家们发现了潜在的新生物标志物，可以表明被诊断患有转移性黑色素瘤的人对免疫疗法的反应如何。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Scientists-identify-潜在-生物标记-关联-与-阳性-免疫疗法-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Scientists-identify-潜在-生物标记-关联-with-positive-immunotherapy-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d370c17-d7a5-427a-90c6-01baa6ca4d68 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 14:05:47 -0400 Scientists identify potential biomarkers associated with positive immunotherapy response
针对种族和性别的干预措施可能更有效地预防服药过量死亡宾夕法尼亚州立大学领导的一个研究小组研究了种族和性别之间药物治疗入院率和药物过量死亡的差异，他们表示，考虑到种族和性别的兴奋剂和阿片类药物使用干预措施可能比目前的方法更有效地预防药物过量死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Race-and-gender-specific-interventions-may-be-more- effective-at-preventing-overdose-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Race-and-gender-specific-interventions-may-be-more- effective-at-preventing-overdose-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e6e76b9-73e9-4a5a-a949-f124c38aa2c7 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 13:58:44 -0400 Race- and gender-specific interventions may be more effective at preventing overdose deaths
研究表明接受儿童霍奇金淋巴瘤治疗的女性面临生育挑战根据今天（周一）在欧洲人类生殖与胚胎学学会第 39 届年会上公布的研究结果，接受儿童霍奇金淋巴瘤治疗的女性可能会在年轻时面临生育能力下降的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Research-shows-fertility-challenges-for-women-treatment-for-childhood-Hodgkin-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Research-shows-fertility-challenges-for-women-treatment-for-childhood-Hodgkin-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b7ec110-da3e-4b1e-b276-3c3aa3ddc237 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 13:51:35 -0400 Research shows fertility challenges for women treated for childhood Hodgkin lymphoma
对于想要推迟生育的女性来说，选择性卵母细胞冷冻保存可能是一个有前途的选择今天（周一）在欧洲人类学会第 39 届年会上发表的一项研究显示，超过 40% 在 30 多岁选择冷冻卵子的女性在以后返回生育诊所时能够生下孩子。生殖和胚胎学（ESHRE）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Elective-o Bathroom-cryopreservation-may-be-a-promising-option-for-women-who-want-to-delay-parenthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Elective-o Bathroom-cryopreservation-may-be-a-promising-option-for-women-who-want-to-delay-parenthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5ee48d9-3cff-4220-9d48-c7c1aff9773a Mon, 26 Jun 2023 13:47:05 -0400 Elective oocyte cryopreservation may be a promising option for women who want to delay parenthood
波恩大学医院和 DZNE 荣获著名的“共济失调卓越中心”奖波恩大学医院 (UKB) 的共济失调中心和 DZNE 因其患者护理和研究而被美国国家共济失调基金会 (NAF) 授予“共济失调卓越中心”称号，这是欧洲唯一的组织。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/University-Hospital-Bonn-and-DZNE-receive-prestigious-Ataxia-Center-of-Excellence-award.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/University-Hospital-Bonn-and-DZNE-receive-prestigious-Ataxia-Center-of-Excellence-award.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e95d94bc-f39a-4abf-92ab-be7cc7fa6006 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 13:37:33 -0400 University Hospital Bonn and DZNE receive prestigious "Ataxia Center of Excellence" award
NCI 拨款 980 万美元旨在消除癌症差异威尔康奈尔医学院和哥伦比亚大学从美国国立卫生研究院下属的国家癌症研究所 (NCI) 获得了 980 万美元的五年期拨款，以帮助消除因持续贫困而加剧的癌症差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/2498-million-NCI-grant-aims-to-combat-cancer-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/2498-million-NCI-grant-aims-to-combat-cancer-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d02c0ae-c491-4e7f-967a-e18c50fe22ba Mon, 26 Jun 2023 13:20:24 -0400 $9.8 million NCI grant aims to combat cancer disparities
研究表明嗅觉差与老年人患抑郁症的风险增加有关约翰·霍普金斯大学医学院的研究人员在一项为期八年的跟踪研究中，对 2000 多名居住在社区的老年人进行了跟踪研究，他们表示，他们获得了重要的新证据，证明嗅觉下降与晚年抑郁症风险之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Study-link-poor-sense-of-smell-with-increased-risk-of-depression-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Study-link-poor-sense-of-smell-with-increased-risk-of-depression-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff2f2d51-e1c7-48b3-9873-c988f79dc948 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 13:07:00 -0400 Study links poor sense of smell with increased risk of depression in older adults
突破性治疗进入临床试验，为囊性纤维化患者带来新希望一种可能具有突破性的囊性纤维化新疗法的临床测试正在进行中。这种有前途的可吸入分子假体由伊利诺伊大学厄巴纳-香槟分校卡尔伊利诺伊医学院和爱荷华大学卡弗医学院的科学家与衍生生物技术公司 Cystic Medicines 合作开创，旨在改善无法从当前治疗中受益的 CF 患者的肺功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-hope-for-cystic-太多纤维化-病人-as-groundwriting-treatment-enters-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-hope-for-cystic-太多纤维化-病人-as-groundwriting-treatment-enters-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8835f271-c145-4594-a0ae-48c11ccfb5da Mon, 26 Jun 2023 13:01:01 -0400 New hope for cystic fibrosis patients as groundbreaking treatment enters clinical trial
新研究警告人类胚胎基因编辑的危险科学家发现，早期人类胚胎的细胞通常无法修复 DNA 损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-study-warns-of-dangers-of-gene-editing-in- human-embryos.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/New-study-warns-of-dangers-of-gene-editing-in- human-embryos.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b317beb-266e-4001-aad0-8421f5131b7f Mon, 26 Jun 2023 12:51:24 -0400 New study warns of dangers of gene editing in human embryos
合成药用氟化菲啶的新方法菲啶是由两个六元苯环稠合到一个含氮六元环组成的杂环化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/A-new-approach-for-the-synthesis-of-pharmaceutically-relevant-氟代-phenanthridines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/A-new-approach-for-the-synthesis-of-pharmaceutically-relevant-氟-phenanthridines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49a80685-7cf6-4c74-a426-87e594c112d6 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 12:45:39 -0400 A new approach for the synthesis of pharmaceutically relevant fluorinated phenanthridines
